A

AbbreviateTextTransformer - Class in pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic
A decorator implementation of the Transformer interface that converts the text by shortening words to their abbreviations.
AbbreviateTextTransformer(Transformer) - Constructor for class pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.AbbreviateTextTransformer
Constructs an AbbreviateTextTransformer with the specified Transformer.

C

CapitalizeTextTransformer - Class in pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic
A decorator implementation of the Transformer interface that converts the text to be capitalized.

Constructs a CapitalizeTextTransformer with the specified Transformer.

E

ExpandShortcutsTextTransformer - Class in pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic
A decorator implementation of the Transformer interface that converts the text by expanding words from their abbreviations.
ExpandShortcutsTextTransformer(Transformer) - Constructor for class pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.ExpandShortcutsTextTransformer
Constructs an ExpandShortcutsTextTransformer with the specified Transformer.

I

InverseTextTransformer - Class in pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic
A decorator implementation of the Transformer interface that inverses the input text while maintaining the position of upper and lower case letters.
InverseTextTransformer(Transformer) - Constructor for class pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.InverseTextTransformer
Constructs an InverseTextTransformer with the specified Transformer.

N

NumberToTextTransformer - Class in pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic
A decorator implementation of the Transformer interface that converts all numbers from range 0-1000 and up to two decimal places to text.

Constructs a NumberToTextTransformer with the specified Transformer.

transform(String) - Method in class pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.AbbreviateTextTransformer
Transforms the input text by first applying the transformation of the wrapped Transformer and then shortening all possible phrases of the result to its abbreviations.
transform(String) - Method in class pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.CapitalizeTextTransformer
Transforms the input text by first applying the transformation of the wrapped Transformer and then converting the result to be capitalized.
transform(String) - Method in class pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.ExpandShortcutsTextTransformer
Transforms the input text by first applying the transformation of the wrapped Transformer and then expanding all possible abbreviations in the result.
transform(String) - Method in class pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.InverseTextTransformer
Transforms the input text by first applying the transformation of the wrapped Transformer and then inverting the result while maintaining the position of upper and lower case letters.
transform(String) - Method in class pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.LowerTextTransformer
Transforms the input text by first applying the transformation of the wrapped Transformer and then converting the result to lowercase.
transform(String) - Method in class pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.NumberToTextTransformer
Transforms the input text by first applying the transformation of the wrapped Transformer and then converting all numbers from range 0-1000 and up to two decimal places to text.
transform(String) - Method in class pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.RemoveDuplicatesTextTransformer
Transforms the input text by first applying the transformation of the wrapped Transformer and then removing duplicates form the result.
transform(String) - Method in class pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.TextTransformer
Returns the input text without applying any transformation.
transform(String) - Method in interface pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.Transformer
Transforms the input text according to the specific implementation of the transformer.
transform(String) - Method in class pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.TransformerDecorator
Processes the input text using the wrapped Transformer.
transform(String) - Method in class pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.UpperTextTransformer
Transforms the input text by first applying the transformation of the wrapped Transformer and then converting the result to uppercase.
transformer - Variable in class pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.TransformerDecorator
The wrapped Transformer instance whose behavior is being extended or modified.
Transformer - Interface in pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic
This interface represents an operation of text transformation.
TransformerDecorator - Class in pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic
An abstract base class for creating decorators for the Transformer interface.
TransformerDecorator(Transformer) - Constructor for class pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.TransformerDecorator
Constructs a TransformerDecorator with the specified Transformer instance.
